26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_core_gpuobj.c,v 1.4 2018/08/27 14:51:33 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include <core/gpuobj.h>
30#include <core/engine.h>
31
32#include <subdev/instmem.h>
33#include <subdev/bar.h>
34#include <subdev/mmu.h>
35
36#ifdef __NetBSD__
37
38/*
39 * XXX I think this should be done with bus_space, but the depth of
40 * abstractions is dizzying and I'm not actually sure where these
41 * pointers come from.
42 */
43
44# define __iomem __nvkm_gpuobj_iomem
45# define ioread32_native fake_ioread32_native
46# define iowrite32_native fake_iowrite32_native
47
48static inline uint32_t
49ioread32_native(const void __iomem *ptr)
50{
51 uint32_t v;
52
53 v = *(const uint32_t __iomem *)ptr;
54 membar_consumer();
55
56 return v;
57}
58
59static inline void
60iowrite32_native(uint32_t v, void __iomem *ptr)
61{
62
63 membar_producer();
64 *(uint32_t __iomem *)ptr = v;
65}
66
67#endif
68
69/* fast-path, where backend is able to provide direct pointer to memory */
70static u32
71nvkm_gpuobj_rd32_fast(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset)
72{
73 return ioread32_native((const char __iomem *)gpuobj->map + offset);
74}
75
76static void
77nvkm_gpuobj_wr32_fast(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset, u32 data)
78{
79 iowrite32_native(data, (char __iomem *)gpuobj->map + offset);
80}
81
82#ifdef __NetBSD__
83# undef ioread32_native
84# undef iowrite32_native
85#endif
86
87/* accessor functions for gpuobjs allocated directly from instmem */
88static u32
89nvkm_gpuobj_heap_rd32(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset)
90{
91 return nvkm_ro32(gpuobj->memory, offset);
92}
93
94static void
95nvkm_gpuobj_heap_wr32(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset, u32 data)
96{
97 nvkm_wo32(gpuobj->memory, offset, data);
98}
99
100static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func nvkm_gpuobj_heap;
101static void
102nvkm_gpuobj_heap_release(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj)
103{
104 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_heap;
105 nvkm_done(gpuobj->memory);
106}
107
108static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
109nvkm_gpuobj_heap_fast = {
110 .release = nvkm_gpuobj_heap_release,
111 .rd32 = nvkm_gpuobj_rd32_fast,
112 .wr32 = nvkm_gpuobj_wr32_fast,
113};
114
115static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
116nvkm_gpuobj_heap_slow = {
117 .release = nvkm_gpuobj_heap_release,
118 .rd32 = nvkm_gpuobj_heap_rd32,
119 .wr32 = nvkm_gpuobj_heap_wr32,
120};
121
122static void *
123nvkm_gpuobj_heap_acquire(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj)
124{
125 gpuobj->map = nvkm_kmap(gpuobj->memory);
126 if (likely(gpuobj->map))
127 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_heap_fast;
128 else
129 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_heap_slow;
130 return gpuobj->map;
131}
132
133static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
134nvkm_gpuobj_heap = {
135 .acquire = nvkm_gpuobj_heap_acquire,
136};
137
138/* accessor functions for gpuobjs sub-allocated from a parent gpuobj */
139static u32
140nvkm_gpuobj_rd32(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset)
141{
142 return nvkm_ro32(gpuobj->parent, gpuobj->node->offset + offset);
143}
144
145static void
146nvkm_gpuobj_wr32(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, u32 offset, u32 data)
147{
148 nvkm_wo32(gpuobj->parent, gpuobj->node->offset + offset, data);
149}
150
151static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func nvkm_gpuobj_func;
152static void
153nvkm_gpuobj_release(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj)
154{
155 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_func;
156 nvkm_done(gpuobj->parent);
157}
158
159static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
160nvkm_gpuobj_fast = {
161 .release = nvkm_gpuobj_release,
162 .rd32 = nvkm_gpuobj_rd32_fast,
163 .wr32 = nvkm_gpuobj_wr32_fast,
164};
165
166static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
167nvkm_gpuobj_slow = {
168 .release = nvkm_gpuobj_release,
169 .rd32 = nvkm_gpuobj_rd32,
170 .wr32 = nvkm_gpuobj_wr32,
171};
172
173static void *
174nvkm_gpuobj_acquire(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj)
175{
176 gpuobj->map = nvkm_kmap(gpuobj->parent);
177 if (likely(gpuobj->map)) {
178 gpuobj->map = (u8 *)gpuobj->map + gpuobj->node->offset;
179 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_fast;
180 } else {
181 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_slow;
182 }
183 return gpuobj->map;
184}
185
186static const struct nvkm_gpuobj_func
187nvkm_gpuobj_func = {
188 .acquire = nvkm_gpuobj_acquire,
189};
190
191static int
192nvkm_gpuobj_ctor(struct nvkm_device *device, u32 size, int align, bool zero,
193 struct nvkm_gpuobj *parent, struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj)
194{
195 u32 offset;
196 int ret;
197
198 if (parent) {
199 if (align >= 0) {
200 ret = nvkm_mm_head(&parent->heap, 0, 1, size, size,
201 max(align, 1), &gpuobj->node);
202 } else {
203 ret = nvkm_mm_tail(&parent->heap, 0, 1, size, size,
204 -align, &gpuobj->node);
205 }
206 if (ret)
207 return ret;
208
209 gpuobj->parent = parent;
210 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_func;
211 gpuobj->addr = parent->addr + gpuobj->node->offset;
212 gpuobj->size = gpuobj->node->length;
213
214 if (zero) {
215 nvkm_kmap(gpuobj);
216 for (offset = 0; offset < gpuobj->size; offset += 4)
217 nvkm_wo32(gpuobj, offset, 0x00000000);
218 nvkm_done(gpuobj);
219 }
220 } else {
221 ret = nvkm_memory_new(device, NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST, size,
222 abs(align), zero, &gpuobj->memory);
223 if (ret)
224 return ret;
225
226 gpuobj->func = &nvkm_gpuobj_heap;
227 gpuobj->addr = nvkm_memory_addr(gpuobj->memory);
228 gpuobj->size = nvkm_memory_size(gpuobj->memory);
229 }
230
231 return nvkm_mm_init(&gpuobj->heap, 0, gpuobj->size, 1);
232}
233
234void
235nvkm_gpuobj_del(struct nvkm_gpuobj **pgpuobj)
236{
237 struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj = *pgpuobj;
238 if (gpuobj) {
239 if (gpuobj->parent)
240 nvkm_mm_free(&gpuobj->parent->heap, &gpuobj->node);
241 nvkm_mm_fini(&gpuobj->heap);
242 nvkm_memory_del(&gpuobj->memory);
243 kfree(*pgpuobj);
244 *pgpuobj = NULL;
245 }
246}
247
248int
249nvkm_gpuobj_new(struct nvkm_device *device, u32 size, int align, bool zero,
250 struct nvkm_gpuobj *parent, struct nvkm_gpuobj **pgpuobj)
251{
252 struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj;
253 int ret;
254
255 if (!(gpuobj = *pgpuobj = kzalloc(sizeof(*gpuobj), GFP_KERNEL)))
256 return -ENOMEM;
257
258 ret = nvkm_gpuobj_ctor(device, size, align, zero, parent, gpuobj);
259 if (ret)
260 nvkm_gpuobj_del(pgpuobj);
261 return ret;
262}
263
264int
265nvkm_gpuobj_map(struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj, struct nvkm_vm *vm,
266 u32 access, struct nvkm_vma *vma)
267{
268 struct nvkm_memory *memory = gpuobj->memory;
269 int ret = nvkm_vm_get(vm, gpuobj->size, 12, access, vma);
270 if (ret == 0)
271 nvkm_memory_map(memory, vma, 0);
272 return ret;
273}
274
275void
276nvkm_gpuobj_unmap(struct nvkm_vma *vma)
277{
278 if (vma->node) {
279 nvkm_vm_unmap(vma);
280 nvkm_vm_put(vma);
281 }
282}
283
284/* the below is basically only here to support sharing the paged dma object
285 * for PCI(E)GART on <=nv4x chipsets, and should *not* be expected to work
286 * anywhere else.
287 */
288
289int
290nvkm_gpuobj_wrap(struct nvkm_memory *memory, struct nvkm_gpuobj **pgpuobj)
291{
292 if (!(*pgpuobj = kzalloc(sizeof(**pgpuobj), GFP_KERNEL)))
293 return -ENOMEM;
294
295 (*pgpuobj)->addr = nvkm_memory_addr(memory);
296 (*pgpuobj)->size = nvkm_memory_size(memory);
297 return 0;
298}
